ansible_deployment.Inventory¶

class ansible_deployment.Inventory(inventory_path, inventory_plugin, ansible_user='ansible')¶

Represents an ansible inventory.

Parameters

  • inventory_path (str) – Path to inventory.

  • inventory_plugin (str) – Name of inventory plugin.

  • ansible_user (str) – Ansible user.

plugins¶

Available inventory plugins,

Type

dict

plugin¶

Inventory plugin object.

Type

InventoryPlugin

hosts¶

Hosts dictionary representing hosts.yml

Type

dict

host_vars¶

Host variables.

Type

dict

group_vars¶

Group variables.

Type

dict

vars¶

Variable lookup table.

Type

dict

write()¶

Writes inventory files to inventory_path.
